ComicInfo.Title: Stars, Stripes, and Spiders!
ComicInfo.Summary: Stars, Stripes, and Spiders!: Spider-Man helps Captain America fight agents of A.I.M. and the Grey Gargoyle, who are out to steal a secret weapons system.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:34:37. [Issue ID 857238]
ComicInfo.Characters: Grey Gargoyle,S.H.I.E.L.D.,Spider-Man,Red Skull (cameo flashback),A.I.M. [Advanced Idea Mechanics],Captain America [Steve Rogers]
